Framework.Implementations
Class DisplayObject

java.lang.Object
  Framework.Implementations.DisplayObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDisplayObject, IUpdatable
public class DisplayObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDisplayObject, IUpdatable

The DisplayObject contains all the data for displaying something by a Core instance.

Version:
0.6
Author:
(Marc Price)

DisplayObject

                     java.lang.String tex,
                     double scale)
Constructor for objects of class DisplayObject

Parameters:
model - the path to the file for the model
tex - the path to the file for the texture
scale - the amount to scale the model by to produce the rqd size object

inBounds

public void inBounds()
METHOD: This method is the aquariums main boundary detection system. DisplayObject uses this to know if objects hit a wall, if they do they will swim in the opposite direction from which they came.
